      • persist

        public boolean persist(java.lang.Object o)
        Method to save a new client when the id is at zero. If the id is not at zero than it updates the client if there were any changes made.
        Specified by:
        persist in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        o - is an Object that holds the information to be added to the database.
        Returns:
        a boolean if the client was successfully updated or added.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        o - is an Object the user wishes to remove
        Returns:

        search in interface Broker
        Parameters:
        searchItem - is a String of the user input to search for
        type - is the type of data the user is searching for.
        Returns:
        a List of all the Objects that match the criteria, to be displayed in the front-end GUI.

                          char client_type,
                          long id)
        Method to update the clients fields
        Parameters:
        first_name - a String for the client's first name.
        last_name - a String for the client's last name.
        address - a String for the client's address.
        postal_code - a String for the client's postal code.
        phone_number - a String for the client's phone number.
        client_type - a char for the client's type
        id - a long for the client's id number
